mapper.select: select idx from member where email=#{email}
select idx from member where email=#{email} and userpw=#{userpw}
mapper.insert: insert into member(idx, userpw, userkind, email, nickname, joindate) values(member_seq.nextval,#{userpw},0,#{email},#{nickname},sysdate)
mapper.update: update member set userpw=#{userpw}, userkind=#{userkind}, email=#{email}, nickname=#{nickname}, homepage=#{homepage}, birth_date=#{birth_date}, introduce=#{introduce}, gender=#{gender}, joindate=#{joindate}, agree_marketing=#{agree_marketing}, agree_email=#{agree_email} where idx=#{idx}
